title: Radical Dreamer 001 (1995) Mark Wheatley
description:
In the world of 3052, Max Wrighter dreamed of bringing education to the masses. He designed the DreamNet, an electronic web capable of linking its users to a dimension beyond reality-a realm from which a free exchange of knowledge and experience might enlighten the world. But with no means to enact the DreamNet, Max sold his dream to the Owners, the uberclass who ruled society. Max had faith that they would make his dreams a reality. But the Owners tailored the Net into an addictive stream of propaganda and pandering entertainment while reaping profits. Severing his ties to reality, he flung himself headlong into the DreamNet - and found himself capable of entering the dreams of any person linked to the Net becoming the Radical Dreamer


I have scanned all six issues and should be posted in a few weeks. each issue has multiple two-page spreads that require a lot of merging.


Enjoy and Seed
